title: Add collision model for DRC Vehicle roll bars.

content.raw:
Darpa's intent in choosing the Polaris Ranger EV was:
"The Polaris has a key distinction of a roll cage, intended to facilitate vehicle ingress and egress.", but there are no collision models for the roll bars or the various other chassis features the robot could grab on to to get in or out.
How about putting cylinder collision models in the straight sections of the roll bars?
Chris
content.html: Darpa's intent in choosing the Polaris Ranger EV was: "The Polaris has a key distinction of a roll cage, intended to facilitate vehicle ingress and egress.", but there are no collision models for the roll bars or the various other chassis features the robot could grab on to to get in or out. How about putting cylinder collision models in the straight sections of the roll bars? Chris
